author: James Martin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Mix the paprika and lemon juice in a bowl to combine. Add the pork fillet and allow to marinate. Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan and sear the pork for 2-3 minutes on each side. Transfer to the oven and cook for 8-10 minutes, until cooked through. For the chutney, heat the apple, tomato, oil, vinegar, sugar and parsley in a medium pan for 6-8 minutes until softened.  To serve, allow the pork to rest and then slice on the diagonal. Spoon the chutney alongside and serve with a wedge of lime and drizzle of balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: 1 tbsp paprika,  2 lemons, juice only,  150g/5oz pork fillet,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ apple, diced,  ½ tomato, diced,  1 tsp vegetable oil,  1 tsp vinegar ,  1 tsp sugar,  1 tsp fresh parsley, chopped,  wedge of lime,  balsamic vinegar
